welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Babylon, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights at Republic Field Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers VIP services for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Located within the main terminal, Concourse A is dedicated to serving domestic flights operated by major airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Also located within the main terminal, Concourse B serves domestic flights operated by smaller regional airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Domestic flights for Delta and Delta Connection

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Domestic and international flights for American Airlines

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free, but may require a login after a certain amount of time.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights for airlines such as JetBlue, United, and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Delta, WestJet, and Frontier.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network for up to 30 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport caters to the needs of private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
